components.name: button
components.description: Multi-variant button with responsive sizes, loading state, icon slots, and polymorphic rendering via asChild.
components.a11y: Uses native <button> element. disabled prop sets disabled attribute. isLoading disables the button and shows a spinner. touchTarget ensures WCAG 2.5.5 minimum 44px hit area.

components.name: badge
components.description: Inline badge with semantic color variants for status indicators and tags.
components.a11y: Renders as a <span>. For status meaning, ensure surrounding context or aria-label provides semantic info.

components.name: input
components.description: Text input with glass variant, icon slots, and inline error message support.
components.usage: <Input variant="glass" inputSize="lg" leftIcon={<Icon name="search" />} placeholder="Search..." error="Required field" />
components.a11y: Sets aria-invalid when error is truthy. String error renders a message with role="alert" and links via aria-describedby. Use labelId or <Label htmlFor> for labeling.

components.name: icon
components.description: Icon wrapper around iconoir-react with a named icon map and size presets.
components.a11y: Renders with aria-hidden="true" by default. Wrap in a button or link with an aria-label for interactive use.

components.name: switch
components.description: Toggle switch with controlled/uncontrolled modes, three sizes, and proper ARIA switch role.
components.a11y: Uses role="switch" with aria-checked. label prop sets aria-label. Supports keyboard toggle via Enter key.

components.name: avatar
components.description: Circular avatar with image source, fallback initials, and five size presets.
components.a11y: Image has alt text. Fallback initials are aria-hidden when alt is provided.

components.name: separator
components.description: Horizontal or vertical visual separator line.
components.a11y: Uses role="separator" with aria-orientation.

components.name: progress
components.description: Animated progress bar with value label and semantic color variants.
components.a11y: Uses role="progressbar" with aria-valuenow, aria-valuemin, aria-valuemax, and aria-label.

components.name: label
components.description: Form label with required indicator and disabled state.
components.a11y: Native <label> element. required adds a visual asterisk (aria-hidden). Use htmlFor to associate with an input.

components.name: textarea
components.description: Textarea with configurable resize behavior and error state.
components.a11y: Sets aria-invalid when error is true. Pair with <Label> for accessible labeling.

components.name: skeleton
components.description: Skeleton loading placeholder with text, circular, and rectangular variants. Includes a CardSkeleton preset.
components.a11y: Decorative element. Use aria-busy="true" on the parent container while loading.

components.name: code-block
components.description: Lightweight syntax-highlighting code block with built-in tokenizer. No external highlighting dependency.
components.a11y: Renders as <pre><code>. Content is selectable and copyable.

components.name: card
components.description: Card container with default, glass, and interactive variants. Compound sub-components for structured content.
components.a11y: Interactive variant adds cursor-pointer. Wrap in <a> or add onClick with appropriate role for clickable cards.

components.name: modal
components.description: Accessible modal dialog with portal rendering, focus trap, backdrop blur, and compound sub-components.
components.usage:
<Modal isOpen={open} onClose={() => setOpen(false)} size="md">
  <ModalHeader>
    <ModalTitle>Confirm</ModalTitle>
    <ModalCloseButton onClick={() => setOpen(false)} />
  </ModalHeader>
  <ModalBody>Are you sure?</ModalBody>
  <ModalFooter>
    <Button variant="ghost" onClick={() => setOpen(false)}>Cancel</Button>
    <Button>Confirm</Button>
  </ModalFooter>
</Modal>
components.a11y: role="dialog" with aria-modal. Focus trapped within modal. Escape key closes. Body scroll locked. Focus restored on close.

components.name: tabs
components.description: Accessible tabs with underline and pill variants, animated indicator, and keyboard navigation.
components.usage:
<Tabs defaultValue="overview" variant="pill">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTab value="overview">Overview</TabsTab>
    <TabsTab value="code">Code</TabsTab>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsPanel value="overview">Overview content</TabsPanel>
  <TabsPanel value="code">Code content</TabsPanel>
</Tabs>
components.a11y: Uses role="tablist", role="tab", role="tabpanel". Arrow keys navigate between tabs. Home/End jump to first/last tab. aria-selected tracks active tab.

components.name: toast
components.description: Toast notification with semantic variant styling, auto-dismiss timer, and slide-in animation.
components.usage:
<ToastContainer position="top-right">
  <Toast variant="success" title="Saved" description="Changes saved successfully." />
</ToastContainer>
components.a11y: Uses role="alert" with aria-live="polite". Dismiss button has aria-label. Duration=0 disables auto-dismiss for persistent toasts.

components.name: dropdown
components.description: Accessible dropdown select with single/multi-select, search/filter, portal rendering, and compound API.

props.name: options
props.type: Array<{ value: string, label: string, disabled?: boolean }>

components.usage:
<Dropdown
  options={[
    { value: 'react', label: 'React' },
    { value: 'vue', label: 'Vue' },
  ]}
  value={framework}
  onChange={setFramework}
  searchable
/>
components.a11y: Trigger uses role="combobox" with aria-expanded/aria-haspopup. Menu uses role="listbox". Items use role="option" with aria-selected. Full keyboard navigation: Arrow keys, Enter, Escape, Home, End, type-ahead.

components.name: accordion
components.description: Accessible accordion with single/multiple open modes, collapsible option, and animated content reveal.
components.usage:
<Accordion type="single" collapsible>
  <AccordionItem value="faq-1">
    <AccordionTrigger>What is this?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>A component library.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
components.a11y: Triggers use aria-expanded and aria-controls. Content uses role="region" with aria-labelledby. Arrow key navigation between triggers. Home/End support.

components.name: nav
components.description: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop link row, mobile drawer, theme toggle, and hide-on-scroll behavior.

props.name: items
props.type: Array<{ label: string, href: string, isActive?: boolean, external?: boolean }>

components.usage:
<Nav
  logo="Kit"
  items={[
    { label: 'Components', href: '/components' },
    { label: 'GitHub', href: 'https://github.com/...', external: true },
  ]}
  theme={theme}
  onThemeToggle={toggleTheme}
  fixed
/>
components.a11y: Uses <nav> element. Mobile menu button has aria-label and aria-expanded. External links get target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer". Mobile drawer has focus trap.

components.name: hero
components.description: Hero section with optional badge, gradient title text, description, and CTA button row.

props.name: ctas
props.type: Array<{ label: string, href: string, variant?: 'primary'|'secondary'|'ghost' }>

components.usage:
<Hero
  badge="New Release"
  title="Ship components faster"
  description="A registry of production-ready React components."
  ctas={[{ label: 'Install', href: '/install' }]}
/>
components.a11y: Title renders as <h1>. CTA links render inside <Button asChild> for proper semantics. Uses <section> element.

components.name: section
components.description: Layout section wrapper with size constraints, vertical spacing presets, and optional container.
components.usage:
<Section size="lg" spacing="lg" id="features">
  <SectionHeader title="Features" description="Everything you need." align="center" />
  {children}
</Section>
components.a11y: Uses <section> element. When id is provided, adds scroll-margin-top for anchor link offset. SectionHeader title renders as <h2>.

components.name: footer
components.description: Site footer with ecosystem site links, optional section columns, social icons, and copyright bar.

props.name: sections
props.type: Array<{ title: string, links: Array<{ label: string, href: string }> }>

props.name: socialLinks
props.type: Array<{ label: string, href: string, icon: ReactNode }>

components.usage: Kit} />
components.a11y: Uses <footer> element. Social links have aria-label. External links open in new tab with noopener noreferrer.

components.name: tooltip
components.description: Portal-based tooltip with auto-positioning, configurable delays, and optional arrow.
components.usage:
<Tooltip content="Copy to clipboard" position="top">
  <Button variant="ghost"><Icon name="copy" /></Button>
</Tooltip>
components.a11y: Uses role="tooltip" with aria-describedby on trigger. Shows on hover and focus. Auto-repositions to stay in viewport.

components.name: theme-toggle
components.description: Dark/light theme toggle button that shows sun or moon icon based on current theme.
components.a11y: Uses aria-label describing the action (e.g. 'Switch to light mode').

components.name: command-box
components.description: Copyable terminal command display with clipboard integration and visual copy confirmation.
components.a11y: Copy button has aria-label. Copied state announced via aria-live="polite" region for screen readers.

components.name: mobile-drawer
components.description: Slide-in drawer panel for mobile navigation with backdrop, focus trap, and escape-to-close.
components.a11y: Uses role="dialog" with aria-modal. Focus trapped inside drawer. Escape key closes. Body scroll locked when open. Focus restored on close.

components.name: error-boundary
components.description: React error boundary that catches JavaScript errors in child components and displays fallback UI with retry option.
components.a11y: Default fallback has heading structure and a retry button. ErrorFallback sub-component provides full-page error display with reload and home link options.
